an1.333:1.1: “Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, appamattakaṃ imasmiṃ jambudīpe ārāmarāmaṇeyyakaṃ vanarāmaṇeyyakaṃ bhūmirāmaṇeyyakaṃ pokkharaṇirāmaṇeyyakaṃ;
an1.333:1.2: atha kho etadeva bahutaraṃ yadidaṃ ukkūlavikūlaṃ nadīviduggaṃ khāṇukaṇṭakaṭṭhānaṃ pabbatavisamaṃ;
an1.333:1.3: evamevaṃ kho, bhikkhave, appakā te sattā ye thalajā, atha kho eteva sattā bahutarā ye odakā.
an1.334:1.1: … Evamevaṃ kho, bhikkhave, appakā te sattā ye manussesu paccājāyanti;
an1.334:1.2: atha kho eteva sattā bahutarā ye aññatra manussehi paccājāyanti.
an1.334:2.1: … Evamevaṃ kho, bhikkhave, appakā te sattā ye majjhimesu janapadesu paccājāyanti;
an1.334:2.2: atha kho eteva sattā bahutarā ye paccantimesu janapadesu paccājāyanti aviññātāresu milakkhesu.
an1.335:1.1: … Evamevaṃ kho, bhikkhave, appakā te sattā ye paññavanto ajaḷā aneḷamūgā paṭibalā subhāsitadubbhāsitassa atthamaññātuṃ;
an1.335:1.2: atha kho eteva sattā bahutarā ye duppaññā jaḷā eḷamūgā na paṭibalā subhāsitadubbhāsitassa atthamaññātuṃ.
an1.336:1.1: … Evamevaṃ kho, bhikkhave, appakā te sattā ye ariyena paññācakkhunā samannāgatā;
an1.336:1.2: atha kho eteva sattā bahutarā ye avijjāgatā sammūḷhā.
an1.337:1.1: … Evamevaṃ kho, bhikkhave, appakā te sattā ye labhanti tathāgataṃ dassanāya;
an1.337:1.2: atha kho eteva sattā bahutarā ye na labhanti tathāgataṃ dassanāya.
an1.338:1.1: … Evamevaṃ kho, bhikkhave, appakā te sattā ye labhanti tathāgatappaveditaṃ dhammavinayaṃ savanāya;
an1.338:1.2: atha kho eteva sattā bahutarā ye na labhanti tathāgatappaveditaṃ dhammavinayaṃ savanāya.
an1.339:1.1: … Evamevaṃ kho, bhikkhave, appakā te sattā ye sutvā dhammaṃ dhārenti;
an1.339:1.2: atha kho eteva sattā bahutarā ye sutvā dhammaṃ na dhārenti.
an1.340:1.1: … Evamevaṃ kho, bhikkhave, appakā te sattā ye dhātānaṃ dhammānaṃ atthaṃ upaparikkhanti;
an1.340:1.2: atha kho eteva sattā bahutarā ye dhātānaṃ dhammānaṃ atthaṃ na upaparikkhanti.
an1.341:1.1: … Evamevaṃ kho, bhikkhave, appakā te sattā ye atthamaññāya dhammamaññāya dhammānudhammaṃ paṭipajjanti;
an1.341:1.2: atha kho eteva sattā bahutarā ye atthamaññāya dhammamaññāya dhammānudhammaṃ na paṭipajjanti.
an1.342:1.1: … Evamevaṃ kho, bhikkhave, appakā te sattā ye saṃvejaniyesu ṭhānesu saṃvijjanti;
an1.342:1.2: atha kho eteva sattā bahutarā ye saṃvejaniyesu ṭhānesu na saṃvijjanti.
an1.343:1.1: … Evamevaṃ kho, bhikkhave, appakā te sattā ye saṃviggā yoniso padahanti;
an1.343:1.2: atha kho eteva sattā bahutarā ye saṃviggā yoniso na padahanti.
an1.344:1.1: … Evamevaṃ kho, bhikkhave, appakā te sattā ye vavassaggārammaṇaṃ karitvā labhanti samādhiṃ labhanti cittassekaggataṃ;
an1.344:1.2: atha kho eteva sattā bahutarā ye vavassaggārammaṇaṃ karitvā na labhanti samādhiṃ na labhanti cittassekaggataṃ.
an1.345:1.1: … Evamevaṃ kho, bhikkhave, appakā te sattā ye annaggarasaggānaṃ lābhino;
an1.345:1.2: atha kho eteva sattā bahutarā ye annaggarasaggānaṃ na lābhino, uñchena kapālābhatena yāpenti.
an1.346:1.1: … Evamevaṃ kho, bhikkhave, appakā te sattā ye attharasassa dhammarasassa vimuttirasassa lābhino;
an1.346:1.2: atha kho eteva sattā bahutarā ye attharasassa dhammarasassa vimuttirasassa na lābhino.
an1.347-349:1.1: “Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, appamattakaṃ imasmiṃ jambudīpe ārāmarāmaṇeyyakaṃ vanarāmaṇeyyakaṃ bhūmirāmaṇeyyakaṃ pokkharaṇirāmaṇeyyakaṃ;
an1.347-349:1.2: atha kho etadeva bahutaraṃ yadidaṃ ukkūlavikūlaṃ nadīviduggaṃ khāṇukaṇṭakaṭṭhānaṃ pabbatavisamaṃ.
an1.347-349:1.3: Evamevaṃ kho, bhikkhave, appakā te sattā ye manussā cutā manussesu paccājāyanti, atha kho eteva sattā bahutarā ye manussā cutā niraye paccājāyanti …pe… tiracchānayoniyā paccājāyanti …pe… pettivisaye paccājāyanti”.
an1.350-352:1.1: … Evamevaṃ kho, bhikkhave, appakā te sattā ye manussā cutā devesu paccājāyanti;
an1.350-352:1.2: atha kho eteva sattā bahutarā ye manussā cutā niraye paccājāyanti … tiracchānayoniyā paccājāyanti … pettivisaye paccājāyanti.
an1.353-355:1.1: … Evamevaṃ kho, bhikkhave, appakā te sattā ye devā cutā devesu paccājāyanti;
an1.353-355:1.2: atha kho eteva sattā bahutarā ye devā cutā niraye paccājāyanti … tiracchānayoniyā paccājāyanti … pettivisaye paccājāyanti.
an1.356-358:1.1: … Evamevaṃ kho, bhikkhave, appakā te sattā ye devā cutā manussesu paccājāyanti;
an1.356-358:1.2: atha kho eteva sattā bahutarā ye devā cutā niraye paccājāyanti … tiracchānayoniyā paccājāyanti … pettivisaye paccājāyanti.
an1.359-361:1.1: … Evamevaṃ kho, bhikkhave, appakā te sattā ye nirayā cutā manussesu paccājāyanti;
an1.359-361:1.2: atha kho eteva sattā bahutarā ye nirayā cutā niraye paccājāyanti … tiracchānayoniyā paccājāyanti … pettivisaye paccājāyanti.
an1.362-364:1.1: … Evamevaṃ kho, bhikkhave, appakā te sattā ye nirayā cutā devesu paccājāyanti;
an1.362-364:1.2: atha kho eteva sattā bahutarā ye nirayā cutā niraye paccājāyanti … tiracchānayoniyā paccājāyanti … pettivisaye paccājāyanti.
an1.365-367:1.1: … Evamevaṃ kho, bhikkhave, appakā te sattā ye tiracchānayoniyā cutā manussesu paccājāyanti;
an1.365-367:1.2: atha kho eteva sattā bahutarā ye tiracchānayoniyā cutā niraye paccājāyanti … tiracchānayoniyā paccājāyanti … pettivisaye paccājāyanti.
an1.368-370:1.1: … Evamevaṃ kho, bhikkhave, appakā te sattā ye tiracchānayoniyā cutā devesu paccājāyanti;
an1.368-370:1.2: atha kho eteva sattā bahutarā ye tiracchānayoniyā cutā niraye paccājāyanti … tiracchānayoniyā paccājāyanti … pettivisaye paccājāyanti.
an1.371-373:1.1: … Evamevaṃ kho, bhikkhave, appakā te sattā ye pettivisayā cutā manussesu paccājāyanti;
an1.371-373:1.2: atha kho eteva sattā bahutarā ye pettivisayā cutā niraye paccājāyanti … tiracchānayoniyā paccājāyanti … pettivisaye paccājāyanti.
an1.374-377:1.1: … Evamevaṃ kho, bhikkhave, appakā te sattā ye pettivisayā cutā devesu paccājāyanti;
an1.374-377:1.2: atha kho eteva sattā bahutarā ye pettivisayā cutā niraye paccājāyanti … tiracchānayoniyā paccājāyanti … pettivisaye paccājāyan”ti.
